thread.title: Great location, friendly staff.
thread.title_full: Great location, friendly staff. - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: PepsiBurke
title: Great location, friendly staff.
text: Booked in by a very pleasant and efficient agent by the name of Clifford. Two adults and two teenage girls in one decent size room. Tea and coffee making facilities plus a good sized fridge in the room. Had a partial view of times sq. The location of this hotel is great as it's close to just about everything. Staff very friendly and concierge could not have done more for us.
